actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept a donation of land for addition to the Ocmulgee National Monument in the State of Georgia.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to accept from the owners the donation of all right, title, and interest in and to certain land in Macon, Georgia (known as Drake Field), to be added to the Ocmulgee National Monument in Macon.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept a donation of land for addition to the Ocmulgee National Monument in the State of Georgia.
